content.rendered:
GLOBAL REACH AND DIVERSITY

One point of contact for the world’s best agents

We vet, train, and coach our global recruitment network, letting you focus on what matters most for your institution.

Bangladesh India Sri Lanka Nepal Saudi Arabia Indonesia
United States of America Australia United Arab Emirates Brazil Mexico Colombia
Thailand Vietnam Cambodia Malaysia Nigeria

7,000+ vetted recruiters

Reach new markets

Recruit at scale

Trusted by 0+ institutions globally

Internationally recognised accreditations and partner associations

GLOBAL REACH AND DIVERSITY

We nurture our recruiters,
so they deliver the best

All our recruitment partners receive thorough vetting, training, and ongoing coaching, ensuring they’re ready and supported to promote your institution.

In-depth training

We take care of all onboarding and training, so recruiters are fully across all destinations, admissions and visa details.
Qualified recruiters
Detailed onboarding
Admissions training

24/7 support

Recruiters have access to a 24/7 support team, eliminating any confusion and resolving issues immediately.
Around-the-clock support team
Issue resolution
Eliminate confusion

Careful vetting

Add your courses to the Adventus.io marketplace and get noticed by thousands of recruiters and qualified students.
Business verification
Identity checks
Block any agents you blacklist

Ongoing coaching

Our specialists conduct regular sessions with recruiters, making sure they’re inspired and up to date with your courses.
In-country experts
Destination knowledge
Visa information
Previous
Next

GLOBAL REACH AND DIVERSITY

Recruit at scale, with one point of contact

Access more recruiters with less stress. Adventus.io is your one point of contact to 7,000+ vetted recruitment agents.
All programme data is updated for you
We field all counsellor questions
Gain time with less repetitive admin
Previous
Next

ADVENTUS DRIVE

Want even richer
engagement with recruiters?

Sign up to Adventus Drive to engage directly with our recruiters, on and off platform.

Sponsored emails
Institution Spotlights
On-platform notification
LEARN MORE

GLOBAL REACH AND DIVERSITY

Document manager

Recruiters have access to the latest forms and documents, reducing repetitive enquiries.

Dynamic application form

Entry requirements and application details are automatically generated and always up to date.

Results-driven processes

Structured processes in place to  help recruiters mitigate common application errors.

The tools our recruiters use

Our recruiter network uses intelligent tools to deliver better and more reliable outcomes for you.

Document
manager
Recruiters have access to the latest forms and documents, reducing repetitive enquiries.
Dynamic
application form
Entry requirements and application details are automatically generated and always up to date.
Results-driven processes
Structured processes in place to  help recruiters mitigate common application errors.
Previous
Next

Our institution partners get immediate results

"The platform technology is helping University Canada West get more diversity faster, rather than just using the traditional way of recruiting. We have seen high applications from Nepal for example"

- University Canada West, CANADA

“The number one for me is applications, and that’s exactly what I’ve got—within just two weeks, I’m already getting 17 applications.”

- Director of International Admissions, University of Toledo, usa

“We only had about six Sri Lankan students when I started working with Adventus.io, and we’ve got more than 10x that right now.”

- Humber College, CANADA

"Our goal is to get back to where we were before the pandemic, and to ensure that this is sustainable. We'll push to modestly grow our numbers, but in a way that is market and course diverse – we see Adventus.io playing a key role in this."

- University of Canberra, Australia
learn More
learn More
learn More
learn More

“We only had about six Sri Lankan students when I started working with Adventus.io and we’ve got more than 10x than that right now.”

– CALLUM SAWATZKY- INTERNATIONAL RECRUITMENT, HUMBER COLLEGE, CANADA

LEARN MORE

FREQUENTLY ASKED

Your questions answered

How are you different to other EdTech players?

Our Partnerships team comprise of seasoned industry experts who have over 10 years of international education experience on average. Having held roles  at notable universities, they have been in your shoes and understand the challenges in international recruitment and admissions.

We also have an in-house quality assurance team to ensure only quality applicants reach you. We perform robust candidate, financial and reference checks to save you valuable time and repetitive admin.

Finally, we pass on 100% commission to recruiter agents meaning we remove bias from the equation. We genuinely care about the success of students and want to see them thrive by matching them to the right course every time. This means less turnover and churn for you.

I’m an institution. Does it cost anything to join?

It’s free to become a partner at Adventus! Course listing, quality assurance and access to recruiter agents around the globe is free as a partner.

If you want more influence and control over your student pipeline, you can consider our Adventus Drive membership. Click here to request a demo.

How many applications do you process per month?
We currently process over 7,000+ applications per month. Don’t miss out on receiving quality applications around the globe and partner with us today!
What other institutions are on the marketplace?
We have over 1,500+ institutions already on our marketplace getting quality students from around the globe. See the full list of institution partners here.  Don’t miss out and partner with us today.

Try Adventus.io for free

Sign up to the marketplace and start getting noticed today.

REQUEST DEMO
SIGN UP
